title: is KDA Kai'Sa Prestige skin still available??
body:
I just bought the world pass to get the Prestige edition of Kai'Sa skin but I can't find it in the event shop?? 

Is it still available for purchase?

replies.body:
>K/DA: November 3, 2018 at 9:00 p.m. AEDT – November 20, 2018 at 17:59 p.m. AEDT

https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-worlds-season-2018-event

Im just going to say, that i have 1500 tokens and still cant buy this skin. Its a $200 basically golden chroma that looks worse than the 1350rp one and if you have a life at all you cant get this skin. Riot is a bunch of assholes for making this "chroma" $200 or no life
1. It costs 2500 tokens 2. It's not a chroma, it's a seperate skin. If u don't feel like it's worth getting, stop crying, they stated that it were supposed to be a challenge to get the skin.
And with challenge you mean challenging to the wallet?
i very easily reached 2400 tokens so far from just doing the missions and playing a couple games every day, with only the worlds pass. if you cant afford 1650 rp, i send my condolences.
really not hard, i started last week after just finding this out and im at 1500 points and i have a nice beautiful life :o

200 dollars? LMAO what? I only bought the Worlds 2018 pass and I have school and work, still got the prestige skin??? Stop complaining, it is possible to get it + having a normal life{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
when is the last day to get that chroma?

I have 2398 tokens but I don't know the periods limit for skin is 20 november because I read it's 3 december. Exist 1 solution for I can buy Kai'sa prestige? This change will come back just for one day?
It's not out yet... It should be coming soon but it hasn't become available in the first place yet as it's a part of the after party event, not the worlds event or Halloween event
